column4: hey guys i have somewhat an easy qquestion.... Ok basically i have an ubuntu server and a windows machine... The ubuntu server uses a paid vpn provider so all the data being tunneled is secure... i want to setup chrome on my non server(my desktop gui) to tunnel through my server.. SO basically all the internet on my computer here is just through that computer
is there a setting i can setup in chrome to do taht and what do i need to do on my ubutu server to get that to work??
(just my chrome browser) all my other browsers will be my normal internet
you should not be root, root does not have the display environment setup
your display enviornment varible is not setup, which suggests you are not using ssh X11 forwarding
your making it hard and you don't really know what your doing
just use a command line client to ftp
i woudl love to do command line ftp..
why not just run filezilla on your windows client
ok, then you need to setup ssh forwarding properly and get xming support (not here)
